subject: Baseball
DNA (Deoxyribonucleic Acid)
Tests and Testing
Identification Devices
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball is considering fingerprinting to address the age and identity problems it has encountered in the Dominican Republic, according to several people with knowledge of the situation.
snippet: Major League Baseball is considering fingerprinting to address the age and identity problems it has encountered in the Dominican Republic, according to several people with knowledge of the situation.
